More_info_: More info about {{owner}} can be found from our website
Junction_info_: {{owner}} is a non-profit hackathon and tech community. Our volunteer-led teams organize hackathons, speaker events, coding workshops and other tech events - around the year and around the world.
Looks_like_register_: Looks like you haven't registered to any events yet!
Contact_email_: Your contact email address, where you want to receive necessary notifications related to your activity on the {{platform}} app. Your email address will never be shared with any 3rd parties.
Contact_phone_: Your phone number will only be used to contact you in urgent matters, and will never be shared with any 3rd parties.
Pre_filled_details_: When you register to events on the {{owner}} app, the below details will be pre-filled into your registrations, and updated from your latest registration. In case you have opted in for recruitment functionality, these details will also be shown to select {{owner}} partners who are looking to hire. Please see our privacy policy at {{privacy}} for more details on how your data is used.
Enter_skills_: Enter up to 10 skills you consider yourself proficient at
Enter_roles_: Enter up to 5 roles you have working experience in
You_can_link_: You can link additional links related you in here.
Problem_persists_: If this problem persists, it might be a problem on our end. In this case please reach out to us via email at dev@hackjunction.com for further support.
Period_ended_: The application period for this event has ended!
Looks_like_new_: Looks like you're new here! Let's make sure we have your basic information correct before moving on.
Name_must_five_: Name must be at least 5 characters
Unable_to_create_: Something went wrong...  Unable to create event
Enter_event_name_: Enter the name of your event
Your_message_length_: Your message must be at least 50 characters long
Your_message_long_: Your message can't be more than 1000 characters long
Something_went_wrong_: Something went wrong... Please try again.
No_previous_messages_: No previous messages with {{user}}. When anyone from your organisation sends them a message, it'll show up here!
Message_history_: Here's your message history with {{user}}. You'll also see messages sent from other people in your organisation, so that you don't accidentally send duplicates.
Recruiter_events_: Which events should this recruiter have access to?
Which_organisation_: Which organisation does this recruiter belong to?
Revoke_access_desc_: This means the selected user will no longer be able to access the recruitment dashboard
Search_user_by_: Search user by name or email
No_results_: No results / too many results. Please try specifying your search term.
No_results_filter_: No results with the selected filters.
No_recruiters_: no available mentors in this challenge.
No_challenges_: you have not been assigned to mentor any challenge. Contact the organizers.
Invalid_token_: Invalid access token. Please try logging out and loggin in again. If the problem persists, please contact support.
Invalid_access_: You don't have access to any events. Please try logging out and loggin in again. If the problem persists, please contact support.
Invalid_organisation_: You don't belong to any organisation. Please try logging out and loggin in again. If the problem persists, please contact support.
Choose_field_filter_: Choose a field to filter on
Choose_how_to_filter_: Choose how to filter on the field
Apply_filter_: Apply a set of custom filters
You_can_save_: You can save this filter group for later use. This allowes you to easily view stats for the group, and do things like bulk edit their application or send an email to everyone in the group.
Descriptive_name_: Give a descriptive name to the filter group e.g. participants from Finland
Add_desc_: Add a short description, if needed
Enter_num_helper_: If the field is a text field or a list of value, compares the length of the value
Unsaved_changes_: You have unsaved changes! Are you sure you want to leave this page?
Image_upload_comp_: ImageUpload component must be supplied an upload URL
Upload_size_: Upload size cannot be more than 2MB
Click_or_drag_: Click or drag a file to upload
Join_newsletter_: This is a perfect opportunity to join our mailing list! We'll send very occasional updates about our upcoming events, as well as other things happening in the Junction community. Care to join?
Upload_size_ten_: Upload size cannot be more than 10MB
Current_pro_situation_: What is your current professional situation?
Cool_partners_: Cool! Can our partners contact you regarding job opportunities they have?
Cool_partners_mean_: This means that relevant recruitment information about you (ex. contact info, education, skills and other cv information) will be visible to select {{owner}} partners representatives who are looking to hire. You can also choose to opt out of this later.
Relocation_option_: Would you consider relocating to another country for work as a possibility?
Consent_privacy_: I have read and I consent to the processing of my data in accordance to the
Read_agree_terms_: I've read and agree to the
Confirm_info_: I confirm that the information entered in this form is truthful and accurate.
Apply_as_team_: Do you want to apply as a team?
Please_note_apply_: Please note: if you do apply as a team, you must form the team on the event dashboard, which you will be able to access after completing this form.
Apply_also_alone_: Do you want to apply also alone?
Apply_also_entire_: If your entire team can't make it, do you want to also apply alone?
Platform_organise_hack_: Want to organise a hackathon with {{owner}}?
Designed_developed_: Designed and developed with love and coffee by the Junction team, with the help of:
Edit_selected_registrations_: Here you can edit all of the selected registrations. Expand the panels for the field which you want to edit - if a panel is left
Edit_selected_registrations_cont_: , that field will not be editend in the registrations.
Subject_most_chars_: Message subject can be at most 50 characters!
Body_most_chars_: Message body can be at most 1000 characters!
Call_to_action_required_: Call to action link is required, if call to action title is entered
Call_to_action_valid_: Call to action link must be a valid url, starting with http...
Will_send_to_: This will send an email to {{amount}} recipient(s). If you haven't yet, please send the email to yourself and make sure it looks like you want.
Send_email_selected_: Here you can send an email to all selected participants. Type in your own email address below to test the email before sending it out to everyone!
URL_helper_: Url to a header image for your email
Subject_helper_: The subject line of your message
Subtitle_helper_: A subtitle to be shown under the subject (optional)
Enter_unique_: If you want, you can enter a unique message id here. Messages with the same id will only be sent once to a given participant - this is useful if you want to avoid sending out the same message to all participants who has already received it earlier.
Call_to_action_helper_: If you want a Call to Action button in your email, enter the text for the button here.
Gavel_first_project_online_: Alright! Time to see your first project! Open up the details of the project below to see what it's all about. Take your time reviewing the demo and source code of the project, and once you think you have a good idea of what the project is about, return here and click DONE.
Gavel_first_project_physical_: Alright! Time to see your first project! Open up the details of the project below to see what it's all about.  Take your time reviewing the demo and source code of the project, and once you think you have a good idea of what the project is about, return here and click DONE.
Gavel_compare_projects_online_: Now that you've seen your first project, you should look at the next one. Open up the project under CURRENT, read the description and look at their demo - and make a decision. Which one was better in your opinion - the first project or the one you just saw?
Gavel_compare_projects_online2_: Look at the next project, and after you've formed an opinion about it, make a decision. Remember: you are always comparing your current project to the one you looked at immediately before it - regardless of who won the previous comparison!
Gavel_compare_projects_physical_: Now that you've seen your first project, you should look at the next one. Find the project under CURRENT, read the description and look at their demo, and make a decision. Which one was better in your opinion - the first project or the one you just saw?
Gavel_compare_projects_physical2_: Take a look at the next project, and after you've reviewed it, make a decision. Remember: you are always comparing your current project to the one you saw immediately before it - regardless of who won the previous comparison!
Join_hackerpack_: Sign in to check out our Hackerpack partners!
Registration_info_open_: Your registration is being processed! You'll receive an email notification when we've made the decision, so stay tuned! The registration period is still open, so you can still tweak your registration to maximise your chances of being accepted!
Registration_info_closed_: Your registration is being processed! You'll receive an email notification when we've made the decision, so stay tuned! The registration period is now closed, so you may no longer edit your registration.
Registration_info_rejected_: Unfortunately you didn't quite make it this time...But don't be discouraged, we get a lot of applications and sometimes we have to reject even very talented applicants. Luckily we organise events all of the time, and we would love to have you at one of our other events.
Registration_info_accepted_: Congratulations, your application has been accepted! Welcome to {{eventName}}! You'll still need to confirm your participation to lock in your spot though - please click the button below to do so.
Registration_info_cancelled_: You've cancelled your participation - bummer. We'd love to see you attend one of our other events, see the event calendar below for more information. If something has gone horribly wrong and you've cancelled your participation by accident, please contact us at participants@hackjunction.com as soon as possible.
Registration_info_confirmed_: Awesome, thanks for confirming your participation! More info will come closer to the event. For online participants the Event ID can be ignored
Registration_info_confirmed_to_hub_: Awesome, thanks for confirming your participation! Once you do arrive at the venue, show your Event ID at the registration to gain access to the venue!
Registration_info_checked_in_: Wohoo, you're in! Once the event begins {{time}}, you'll be able to access project submissions and all of the other event-related functionality right here on this dashboard.
Team_none_: It seems like you don’t have a team yet. Here you can create a new team or join already existing one.
Team_info_0_: If one of your team members has already created a team, all you need to do is fill in the team code here.
Team_info_1_: You can also create a new team, and you'll be given a unique team code. You can then share this code with people you want to invite to your team.
Team_join_info_: Share this code with people you want to invite, and they'll be able to join your team.
Project_submissions_upcoming_: Project submissions begin on {{submissionsStartTime}}, and you'll be able to submit your project here. As soon as you have a general idea of what you're building, you should make the first version of your project submission. The project won't be visible to others until the end. You can always edit your project submission until the final submission deadline {{submissionsDeadline}}
Challenge_info_: This event has {{challenges}} different challenges which you can submit your project to. It's a good idea to spend some time investigating the different challenges available and discussing with partners to find out which problem they are interested in working around.
Submission_info_: When submitting your project, you'll be able to choose up to every different challenge that your project applies to. After the submission deadline the jury will review your project,  and decide the winner of the challenge.
Join_event_newsletter_: While Junction's newsletter is great, you could also sign up to the event organizer's newsletter to receive news about future hackathons they organise. How does that sound?
submission_form_name_hint: Enable if you want users to be able to create a name for their project
submission_form_images_hint: Enable if you want users to be able to submit images about their project submission
submission_form_punchline_hint: Enable if you want to provide a punchline for the project submission
submission_form_description_hint: Enable if you want users to provide a description of their project submission
submission_form_track_hint: Enable if you want users to specify the track their project submission belongs to
submission_form_challenges_hint: Enable if you want users to submit project for specific challenge
submission_form_technologies_hint: Enable if you want users to list the technologies they used in their project submission
submission_form_video_hint: Enable if you want users to provide a video about their project submission
submission_form_demo_hint: Enable if you want users to provide a demo of their project submission
submission_form_source_hint: Enable if you want users to provide a link to the source code of their project submission
submission_form_sourcePublic_hint: Enable if you want users to specify whether the source code of their project submission is public
submission_form_location_hint: Enable if you want users to specify the table location of their team
submission_form_privacy_hint: Enable if you want users to set wheter their source code is public or not
submission_form_status_hint: Enable if you want users to indicate the status of their project submission
submission_form_customization_subtitle: Customize the form that teams have to fill up to submit their projects for your event
submission_form_customization_question_d: Click here to write a description for this field
submission_form_customization_section_de: Click here to write a description for this field
submission_form_customization_question_p: Click here to write a placeholder for this field
submission_form_customization_question_h: Click here to write a hint for this field
submission_form_customization_prevent_de: Participants have submitted projects already so you cannot remove sections anymore.
Participants have submitted projects already so you cannot remove questions anymore.
Participation_certificate_message_: Thanks for being a part of {{event}}! While waiting for the next {{organizer}} event to take part in, go ahead and download your personal certificate of participation by clicking the button below!
Event_over_message_gallery_open_: {{event}} is now over, thanks for taking part! Check out your project submission and all of the other cool stuff people made in the project gallery, and stay tuned for the next {{organizer}} event near you!
Event_over_message_gallery_closed_: {{event}} is now over, thanks for taking part! Stay tuned for the next {{organizer}} event near you!
Reviewing_open_message_manual_review_: Sit back and relax while your project is reviewed!
Reviewing_open_message_gavel_review_: Head over to the reviewing page to start reviewing other projects!
Cancel_participation_message_: Are you sure you wish to cancel your participation? This means your spot will be given to someone on the waiting list, and you won't be able to attend the event yourself. If you really can't make it, please cancel your participation so we can take someone else instead.
Cancel_participation_no_: No, I don't want to cancel
Project_submissions_message_if_project_s: Great, you've already made a submission! You can make edits to it until the final submission deadline, so make sure to make it as polished as possible!
Project_submissions_message_if_no_projec: You haven't yet submitted a project! You should go and submit a draft of your project as soon as you have a rough idea of what you're making. You're free to edit your project submission as many times as you wish until the final submission deadline, and the project won't be visible to others until the end. It'll take you under a minute, we promise.
Apply_as_team_no_team_: You've chosen to apply as a team but haven't joined a team yet. You'll need to join a team before we'll begin processing your application!
Team_pending_message_: Registering your team prior to event makes it easier for us to review your application.
Team_complete_message_: You've locked in your team and we can now process your team members' applications - just sit back and relax. You'll also be able to edit your team again closer to the event, if you want to add or remove members.
Join_team_using_code_: Join a team using a code
Field_validation_min_chars_: The {{fieldName}} must have at least {{min}} characters
Field_validation_max_chars_: The {{fieldName}} can have up to {{max}} characters
Field_validation_team_idea_description_r: If you have an idea title, description for the idea is required
Team_name_hint_: Write a name for your team
Team_subtitle_hint_: Write a subtitle for your team
Team_description_hint_: Share what your team is about
Team_idea_title_: Title of the idea explored by your team
Team_idea_title_hint_: Write a title for your idea
Team_idea_description_: Brief explanation of the idea explored by your team
Team_idea_description_hint_: Explain your idea in a few sentences
Team_email_hint_: Your team must have at least an email, a slack, discord or a telegram channel
